Our monthly employee newsletter with company updates and announcements -----
October 2021 Edition

Welcome to the Latest Edition of 
The Justia Insider

Welcome to another edition of The Justia Insider! Autumn and chilly weather are finally here! Are you ready for some spooky fun this Halloween? As the end of the year approaches and the Justia family prepares for the holiday season, we encourage you not to miss the company objectives and never underestimate the strength of internal communication. We hope you all have a great month!

Milestones & Accomplishments

Let’s Find Out What’s Been Achieved So Far by Our Teams at Justia

JSON-LD Schema for Justia Blogs: We've added JSON-LD structured data schema to several of our Justia blogs, such as Onward, Verdict, and Opinion Summary Blogs, among others. This addition helps SEO crawlers better index our sites.

Onward and Avanza QA Automation: Our QA Team released automated checks to ensure that our Onward and Avanza blogs are fully functional.

Customized Onward Feeds on Marketing: We have improved the relevance of the Onward articles shown within our Marketing site by targeting specific post categories.

Server Migrations: Moving towards a more secure infrastructure, we migrated the server of some of our Justia friends' properties like NetForLawyers, Oregon Legal Research, ediscoverycouncil.com, and others over to VPC, highly reducing security risks.

Justia Amplify: In order to improve the accuracy of billing calculations, we implemented a 2-month billing delay specifically for LSA services that was reflected in our internal reports, as well as in the monthly client reports.

JUSTIA PORTAL NEWS

Take a Look at the Ongoing Development of Our Consumer Portal
  • Probate Center: We are creating content for a new center on Estate Administration for probate and disputes that arise during this process.
  • Truck Accidents Center: We are creating content for a new center to advise the victims about their legal rights and the compensation they deserve.
  • Tax and Immigration Centers Revisions: We have updated these centers to account for the Trump to Biden administration’s transition.
  • Personal Injury Center Snippets: We continue to adjust these pages' structure to make the information more accessible.

NEW TEAM MEMBERS

Getting to Know the New Talent at Justia

Andres Sanchez

Engineering Team

I'm a Software Engineer born in La Paz, Baja California Sur. I like coding and learning new technologies, and my goal is to keep growing and use my skills to help others succeed. My hobbies are playing video games and watching movies and TV series. I like to talk about any topic except football.

Sarah Dondysh

Administrative Team

Hi everyone! My name is Sarah Dondysh. I'm 30 years old and a Bay Area, California native. I've been an admin for eight years, doing various work from reception to process improvement and marketing. I'm a huge Disney fan, especially the parks. If you have any questions or want to plan a trip, ask me! I'm always happy to help. I'm excited to be part of the Justia team and can't wait to get to know each of you.

UPCOMING HOLIDAYS

Dates to Remember
Halloween - October 31st*

Halloween is a fun autumn festival celebrated on the night of October 31st when children dress in costumes and go door-to-door asking for candy. Don’t miss the chance to carve your pumpkin into a Jack-o'lantern and shout out "Trick or treat!" Have a scary good time!

*This is a non-federal holiday. It is not officially recognized. For more information about paid holidays please visit Justikia.

TEAM ACTIVITY

Justia “Pixcel” Challenge

Thank you very much to all who participated in our 2021 Justia "Pixcel" Challenge. We received a total of 13 fantastic submissions. With nine votes and after very tight voting, Lenin Angulo won second place and was awarded a $25 Amazon gift card. With 30 votes, Carolina Leija was crowned as the competition winner and received a $50 Amazon gift card. We were delighted by all the submissions full of quality, creativity, and talent. Get ready for the next edition!

HelpDesk Team Taco Friday

During the past month of September, our HelpDesk team organized a Taco Friday activity held from home. Here is a photo collage of the tacos they enjoyed. Bon appétit!.

Upcoming Events

While participation is voluntary, we highly encourage you all to dress up in a costume and nominate yourselves for one of the available categories. Fantastic prizes are waiting for you! We are eager to see a huge display of participation, enthusiasm, and creativity!
